title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1600.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1600.1 - Scope

State Regulations

These rules and regulations relate to the initiation, development and operation of State-aided low rent housing projects by municipal
housing authorities with municipal assistance (except that Part 1601 applies to
all housing authorities and section
1627-1.1
applies to all housing
authorities to the extent specified therein) for occupation by persons or
families of low income whose housing needs cannot be met by the unaided
operation of private enterprise. Such projects are authorized by the provisions
of article 18 of the New York State Constitution and the Public Housing Law of
the State of New York. A municipality may also construct and operate a low rent
project in the absence of a municipal housing authority for such
municipality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1600.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
